feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She owned that, ever since she had been a girl, she had dreaded being caught by her last leg, just as she was getting into bed, by some one concealed under it.

causedBy.name: Fear of being caught by someone under the bed

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She had rather a leaning to ghosts, as I have mentioned before, and what little she did say was all on Mrs Forrester’s side, who, emboldened by sympathy, protested that ghosts were a part of her religion.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She had breath for nothing beyond an imploring “Don’t leave me!” uttered as she clutched my arm so tightly that I could not have quitted her, ghost or no ghost.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She had rather a leaning to ghosts, as I have mentioned before, and what little she did say was all on Mrs Forrester’s side, who, emboldened by sympathy, protested that ghosts were a part of her religion.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She had breath for nothing beyond an imploring “Don’t leave me!” uttered as she clutched my arm so tightly that I could not have quitted her, ghost or no ghost.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She had rather a leaning to ghosts, as I have mentioned before, and what little she did say was all on Mrs Forrester’s side, who, emboldened by sympathy, protested that ghosts were a part of her religion.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: A lady all in white, and without her head, was what she deposed and adhered to, supported by a consciousness of the secret sympathy of her mistress under the withering scorn with which Miss Pole regarded her.

causedBy.name: Fear of seeing a headless lady

feels.exactPlace: During the conversation about the headless lady

Places.name: Darkness Lane
Places.description: A dark and lonely lane where ghostly sightings were reported.
